In space, sound can not be heard, but if it could a bystander would 
hear t=
he loud crack hiss of an asteroid slamming into the cold and 
white metalli=
c shell of a nearby stasis pod.  This rough nudge was 
all that was needed =
to change the stasis pod's planned orbit and 
thrust it towards the inners =
of the solar system.  

An object in motion stays in motion unless acted on=
 and this was the 
case for the stasis pod as it drifted towards the inners=
 of the Solar 
System on a constant course until its path was caught by the=
 third's 
planet's gravitational pull.  The pull was enough to cause the st=
asis 
pod to forgo its journey to the sun and instead to enter the precious=
 
atmosphere of the third planet.

As the pod came screaming down through t=
he atmosphere the metal 
started to heat up.  The once white metal started =
to burn red as the 
stasis pod was quickly coming to the climax of its jour=
ney.  A trail 
of smoke could be seen by anyone that bothered to look up in=
to the 
day sky.  The stasis pod finally came to rest in what was known as =

Maine.  

The occupant of the stasis pod, who was in a stasis, woke with t=
he 
landing of the pod.  The occupant took a quick breath as the internal 
=
speakers of the stasis pod declared,

"Acquiring Beast Mode."

The occupant=
 let out a blood curling scream as its body started to 
change as it downlo=
ad the new mode.
